Eric Schmidt summed up seismic shift at Google's helm in a Twitter post last week that said, Day-to-day adult supervision no longer needed! Eric Schmidt has led Google since 2001, three years before the company went public in August 2004. Since then, Google's shares have grown more than sixfold, at one point surpassing$ 700.
